title: Video Girl Ai, Vol.  01: Preproduction
description: High school is hell for Yota Moteuchi. He's so unpopular his fellow students have a nickname for him: "Dateless." But that doesn't stop him from falling in love with one of them. His gentle classmate Moemi is everything he wants - but is she in love with someone else?
author: Masakazu Katsura
